webscript.shortname: Upload and update the assigned/copy services of an incoming mail
webscript.description:
• filedata : the content to upload
  • siteid : the short-name of the site the document will be uploaded to
  • containerid : the id of the site-container the document will be uploaded to
  • uploaddirectory : the relative path to the container the document will be uploaded to
  • targetService: the target service
  • copyServices: the copy services as a comma-separated list of short-names
  • copyUsers: the copy users as a comma-separated list of user-names
  • validateDelivery: true/false to set the validation on delivery
  • startDelivery: true/false to start delivery (skip pre-assignation)
